paramInformation.label: LED Light
paramInformation.description: LED status when device on or off.

options.label: LED on when load is off
LED on when light is turned on

metadata.inclusion: Press and release the program button.
metadata.exclusion: Press and release the program button.
metadata.reset:
1. Quickly press the button three times
2. Press the button for at least three seconds
3. The LED will blink five times to confirm
